userName.name: What should Claudian call you?
userName.desc: Your name for personalized greetings (leave empty for generic greetings)

excludedTags.name: Excluded tags
excludedTags.desc: Notes with these tags will not auto-load as context (one per line, without #)

mediaFolder.name: Media folder
mediaFolder.desc: Folder containing attachments/images. When notes use ![[image.jpg]], Claude will look here. Leave empty for vault root.

systemPrompt.name: Custom system prompt
systemPrompt.desc: Additional instructions appended to the default system prompt

autoTitle.name: Auto-generate conversation titles
autoTitle.desc: Automatically generate conversation titles after the first user message is sent.

titleModel.name: Title generation model
titleModel.desc: Model used for auto-generating conversation titles.

navMappings.name: Vim-style navigation mappings
navMappings.desc: One mapping per line. Format: "map <key> <action>" (actions: scrollUp, scrollDown, focusInput).

slashCommands.name: Slash Commands
slashCommands.desc: Create custom prompt templates triggered by /command. Use $ARGUMENTS for all arguments, $1/$2 for positional args, @file for file content, and !`bash` for command output.

hiddenSlashCommands.name: Hidden Commands
hiddenSlashCommands.desc: Hide specific slash commands from the dropdown. Useful for hiding Claude Code commands that are not relevant to Claudian. Enter command names without the leading slash, one per line.

mcpServers.name: MCP Servers
mcpServers.desc: Configure Model Context Protocol servers to extend Claude's capabilities with external tools and data sources. Servers with context-saving mode require @mention to activate.

plugins.name: Claude Code Plugins
plugins.desc: Enable or disable Claude Code plugins discovered from ~/.claude/plugins. Enabled plugins are stored per vault.

loadUserSettings.name: Load user Claude settings
loadUserSettings.desc: Load ~/.claude/settings.json. When enabled, user's Claude Code permission rules may bypass Safe mode.

blockedCommands.name: Blocked commands ({platform})
blockedCommands.desc: Patterns to block on {platform} (one per line). Supports regex.
blockedCommands.unixDesc: Unix patterns also blocked on Windows because Git Bash can invoke them.

exportPaths.name: Allowed export paths
exportPaths.desc: Paths outside the vault where files can be exported (one per line). Supports ~ for home directory.

customVariables.name: Custom variables
customVariables.desc: Environment variables for Claude SDK (KEY=VALUE format, one per line). Shell export prefix supported.

envSnippets.name: Snippets
envSnippets.noSnippets: No saved environment snippets yet. Click + to save your current environment configuration.
envSnippets.nameRequired: Please enter a name for the snippet

modal.name: Name
modal.namePlaceholder: A descriptive name for this environment configuration
modal.envVarsPlaceholder: KEY=VALUE format, one per line (export prefix supported)

customContextLimits.name: Custom Context Limits
customContextLimits.desc: Set context window sizes for your custom models. Leave empty to use the default (200k tokens).
customContextLimits.invalid: Invalid format. Use: 256k, 1m, or exact count (1000-10000000).

show1MModel.name: Enable Sonnet with 1M context window
show1MModel.desc: Replace standard Sonnet with Sonnet (1M) in the model selector. Same pricing under 200k tokens. Requires Max subscription.

maxTabs.name: Maximum chat tabs
maxTabs.desc: Maximum number of concurrent chat tabs (3-10). Each tab uses a separate Claude session.
maxTabs.warning: More than 5 tabs may impact performance and memory usage.

tabBarPosition.name: Tab bar position
tabBarPosition.desc: Choose where to display tab badges and action buttons

enableAutoScroll.name: Auto-scroll during streaming
enableAutoScroll.desc: Automatically scroll to the bottom as Claude streams responses. Disable to stay at the top and read from the beginning.

cliPath.name: Claude CLI path
cliPath.desc: Custom path to Claude Code CLI. Leave empty for auto-detection.
cliPath.descWindows: For the native installer, use claude.exe. For npm/pnpm/yarn or other package manager installs, use the cli.js path (not claude.cmd).
cliPath.descUnix: Paste the output of "which claude" â€” works for both native and npm/pnpm/yarn installs.

validation.isDirectory: Path is a directory, not a file

language.name: Language
language.desc: Change the display language of the plugin interface
